::Zardus/Shredder::

Zardus turns around, cursing as Tritan's fire hits him. He fires at Tritan and signals Bloodystrike to open fire also.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder's optics flicker as Quickstrike's tackle slams his head into the ground. The predacon tries to get up, but falls to the ground, unconscious.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike growls, firing off one shot at Kit and one at Tritan.
